channel.title: Changing kicksecure repository to tester will add tor+ by default to the repo
channel.description: If i have set kicksecure repo to be over clearnet using only `https` and then i switched the repository to tester using repository-dist-wizard it will add `tor+` to the repository which is disrespecting user preferences if he choose [C: Clearnet Rep](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Debian#Add_the_Kicksecure_%E2%84%A2_Repository).

item.title: Changing kicksecure repository to tester will add tor+ by default to the repo
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Added a note in the wiki to document this:

Template:Project-APT-Repository-Add: Difference between revisions - Kicksecure

Read full topic
